item.title: Solana On-Chain Meme Token SPARK Surpasses $15 Million Market Cap, with a 471% Price Increase in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 6th, according to GMGN data, the market capitalization of Solana-based AI virtual creature concept Meme token SPARK has exceeded $15 million. The 24-hour trading volume is $52.6 million and the 24-hour price increase is 471%.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases, experience significant price volatility, and require cautious investment.

item.title: Stride: To explore new product lines beyond Cosmos, liquidity staking will continue to operate as usual
item.description: August 6th. The Cosmos ecosystem's liquidity staking protocol, Stride, announced that given Cosmos's decision to no longer pursue its EVM, Stride has reached a settlement with Cosmos. Stride has settled its debts and will be exploring a brand new revenue product line outside of Cosmos. It will share the latest developments once this product line matures.Liquidity staking on Stride will continue to operate normally, and liquidity staking rewards will continue to be used to purchase and burn STRD.

item.title: A certain new address spent $103,000 to buy the Binance Alpha new coin FIR, with a current unrealized gain of $54,000.
item.description: On August 6th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the address 0xc54â€¦359ec spent $103,000 in a single transaction to purchase the newly launched Binance Alpha coin FIR at 19:00 this evening. The average price was $0.05444. The current unrealized profit is $54,000. The market capitalization of FIR is currently $82.5 million.Three hours ago, the newly created address withdrew 108,000 USDT from Binance.

item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin Lacks Support Between $108,000 and $113,000
item.description: On August 6th, the cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented a chart analysis indicating that Bitcoin is facing significant resistance at $117,000. There is a notable gap below and almost no support existing between $108,000 and $113,000.

item.title: Binance Alpha has launched Fireverse (FIR)
item.description: On August 6th, Binance Alpha has now launched Fireverse (FIR).

item.title: US Stock Market Meme Coin MicroStrategy Stock Sees Mixed Pre-market Trading, 'BSC Version of MicroStrategy' Surges 35.6%
item.description: On August 6th, according to the market data of RockFlow, the pre-market trading of US Stock Altcoins MicroStrategy Stocks presented mixed results. They are as follows:ETH MicroStrategy Stocks:Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) decreased by 0.9%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) went down by 1.83%;Bit Digital (BTBT) rose by 0.2%;BTCS Inc (BTCS) increased by 0.97%.BNB MicroStrategy Stocks:CEA Industries (VAPE) surged by 35.6%. It completed a $500 million private placement led by YZi Labs on August 5th, and the stock symbol changed to BNC on August 6th;Windtree Therapeutics (WINT) dropped by 1.32%.SOL MicroStrategy Stocks:DeFi Development Corp (DFDV) decreased by 0.89%.LTC MicroStrategy Stocks:MEI Pharma (MEIP) went up by 0.4%. It increased its LTC holdings by 929,548 coins yesterday at an average price of $107.58 per coin.TRX MicroStrategy Stocks: TRON. Inc (TRON) decreased by 0.07%.

item.title: Galaxy Digital CEO: Crypto Financial Company Craze May Have Peaked
item.description: On August 6th, Michael Novogratz, the founder and CEO of Galaxy Digital, stated during the company's Q2 earnings call that the trend of companies incorporating cryptocurrency into their balance sheets might have reached its peak. He pointed out that the current focus is to monitor which existing companies will evolve into industry leaders.

item.title: CME FedWatch: 87.4% Probability of a 25 Basis Point Rate Cut in September
item.description: Update: On August 6th, based on CME's "FedWatch" data, the likelihood of a 25-basis-point rate cut in September is 87.4%, and the probability of maintaining the rates at the current level is 12.6%.

item.title: The ALL-in-One Index Perpetual Contract opened on Binance at 1.679 US dollars, reaching a high of 1.679 US dollars and is currently trading at 1.03 US dollars.
item.description: On August 6th, based on market data, the ALL-In-One Index Perpetual Contract opened on Binance at 1.679 US dollars and is currently trading at 1.03 US dollars.Previously, it was reported that the ALL-In-One Index tracks all USDT-denominated perpetual contracts on Binance Futures, excluding the following contracts: the ETHBTC Perpetual Contract, U-denominated perpetual contracts quoted in USDC or other stablecoins, U-denominated Futures contracts, the All-In-One Index Perpetual Contract, Perpetual Contract Pre-market Trading, and Coin-margined Perpetual and Futures contracts. The Binance ALL-In-One Index is calculated by using the weighted average price of all constituent real-time index prices.

item.title: White House: Trump to Release "A Statement" Tomorrow at 4:30 AM
item.description: On August 6th, the White House announced that President Trump of the US will give a "statement" in the Oval Office at 4:30 pm ET on Wednesday (4:30 am Beijing time the next day). (IG)
